TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DbCommandDispatcher extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Used for dispatching operations to a such that any registered on will be notified before and after the operation executes. Instances of this class are obtained through the the fluent API.
Docs.remarks: This class is used internally by Entity Framework when executing commands. It is provided publicly so that code that runs outside of the core EF assemblies can opt-in to command interception/tracing. This is typically done by EF providers that are executing commands on behalf of EF.

abstract member NonQuery : System.Data.Common.DbCommand * System.Data.Entity.Infrastructure.Interception.DbCommandInterceptionContext -> int override this.NonQuery : System.Data.Common.DbCommand * System.Data.Entity.Infrastructure.Interception.DbCommandInterceptionContext -> int

Docs.param: The command on which the operation will be executed.
Optional information about the context of the call being made.
Docs.summary: Sends and to any registered on before/after making a call to .
Docs.returns: The result of the operation, which may have been modified by interceptors.
Docs.remarks: Note that the result of executing the command is returned by this method. The result is not available in the interception context passed into this method since the interception context is cloned before being passed to interceptors.
